personal.name: Prince Kumar Gupta
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.subtitle: React | Angular | Node.js | GenAI | PWA | ONDC
personal.summary: Full Stack Developer with 6.5+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance web applications across frontend, backend, and databases. I specialize in React, Angular, Node.js, and REST APIs, delivering clean, maintainable, production-ready systems used at scale. I own features end-to-end ‚Äî from UI/UX implementation to backend architecture, API optimization, and database design. Focused on performance, reliability, and long-term maintainability.

Fixed UI bugs and delivered change requests based on business logic

achievements: Converted Figma designs into responsive, pixel-perfect Vue.js components
Optimized frontend performance reducing initial load times significantly
Integrated ONDC APIs for product discovery and order management
Developed 20-30 min express delivery and same-day scheduled delivery features
Built unified search with category-wise auto-suggestions
Delivered production fixes for OLA Foods platform stability

experience.description: Integrated client servers with the ONDC protocol for the Provider application, focusing on backend API development and ensuring ONEST-compliant event responses.
achievements: Developed ONEST-compliant APIs to emit event responses
Mapped client responses into ONEST-standard formats
Validated provider flow APIs using Postman for accurate integration

experience.description: Contributed to an open-source, scalable learning platform supporting education, healthcare, and agriculture domains across India. Replaced hardcoded logic with dynamic, configurable solutions.

Created Postman-based setup for form registration via APIs
Built reusable Angular components with Material UI and RxJS
Improved backend APIs for form data management and validations
Wrote unit tests using Jest and set up GitHub Actions for CI
Documented the new form system for developer onboarding

projects.title: OLA ONDC Grocery & Food Delivery
projects.description: Progressive Web App for ONDC-based food & grocery delivery with 20-30 min delivery, scheduled orders, unified search, and optimized performance across devices.

details.challenge: Migrating OLA's grocery offerings to the ONDC framework while maintaining sub-30 minute delivery expectations and ensuring a high-performance PWA experience for millions of users.
details.solution: Architected a Vue.js based PWA that integrated directly with ONDC protocols. Implemented batch data loading and pixel-perfect UI components from Figma to ensure fluid navigation and fast TTI (Time to Interactive).
outcomes: Successfully launched ONDC grocery across major Indian metros.
Handled thousands of concurrent users with sub-second page transitions.
Reduced frontend load times by 40% through code splitting and asset optimization.

projects.impact: Serving thousands of users with fast delivery experience and seamless ONDC integration

projects.title: Sunbird ED - National LMS Platform
projects.description: Architected DevOps transformation (Jenkins to GitHub Actions) and managed mission-critical production releases (v6.0 to v8.0) for India's national education infrastructure.
features: Scalable architecture for millions of users

details.challenge: Scaling a national learning platform to support varied internet speeds and diverse devices across India while transitioning from hardcoded logic to a flexible, adopter-friendly framework.
details.solution: Architected a framework-agnostic 'Building Blocks' system. Led a major refactor (PR #9063 - 195+ commits) that replaced legacy hardcoded BMGS (Board, Medium, Grade, Subject) logic with a generic, dynamic configuration system.
outcomes: Platform currently serves millions of students nationwide.
Merged PR #9063: Massively improved codebase flexibility with 195+ commits.
Achieved high code reliability through 80%+ test coverage with Jest.

projects.impact: Led Generic BMGS Refactor (PR #9063) serving millions

projects.title: Sphere - Healthcare LMS
projects.description: Healthcare Learning Management System delivering training programs across Bihar, UP, MP, and other states.

details.challenge: Creating an accessible training platform for healthcare workers in rural areas with limited connectivity, requiring offline support and verifiable certification.
details.solution: Built a robust React/Node.js application with MongoDB. Developed an automated certificate generation engine and a progress tracking system that works reliably across 4+ Indian states.
outcomes: Empowered thousands of healthcare workers with digital training.
Streamlined the certification process for multi-state government programs.
Enhanced tracking for health department administrators.

projects.impact: Training healthcare workers across multiple Indian states

projects.title: DevDesk - High Perf JSON Engine
projects.description: Extreme-performance workspace for processing massive JSON payloads (100MB+) locally. Features a custom virtualized tree and yielding parser to maintain 60FPS.

details.challenge: Handling massive JSON payloads in a single-threaded browser environment without freezing the UI or exceeding memory caps.
details.solution: Architected a 'Compute-Mesh' using Web Workers for off-main-thread parsing. Implemented a custom yielding engine that prevents main-thread blocking and a virtualized DOM to keep rendering under 15k nodes.
outcomes: Stable 60FPS scrolling even with 100MB JSON files.
50% reduction in RAM usage via Transferable Objects.
Privacy-first architecture ensuring zero data leaves the client.

projects.impact: Stable 60FPS on 100MB files via Web Workers

projects.title: eKhatabahi - Ledger Management
projects.description: Comprehensive full-stack digital ledger management system for small businesses, featuring real-time transaction tracking and analytics.

details.challenge: Replacing traditional physical ledgers with a secure, digital alternative that is easy to use for non-technical shop owners while maintaining data integrity.
details.solution: Developed a robust MERN application with a focused UI on transaction speed. Integrated automated balance calculations and secure data encryption for individual ledgers.
outcomes: Digitized ledger management for multiple local businesses.
Reduced reconciliation errors by 90% via automated calculations.
Secure, cloud-synced data available across all devices.

projects.impact: Digital transformation for local business ledgers
